definition: monism, belief that the universe is made of a single substance
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: In a way, it may be the inherent difficulty in monism.
sentences.chinese: 在一定意义上，这也许是一元论的固有困难。

sentences.english: Put in something about the Supernal Oneness. Don't say a syllable about the Infernal Twoness.
sentences.chinese: 说一点天上的一元论，千万别谈地狱的二元论。

sentences.english: I'm going to get them started on monism if I can.
sentences.chinese: 如果能办到我就设法让他们谈一元论。

sentences.english: Don't say a syllable about the Infernal Twoness.
sentences.chinese: 说一点天上的一元论，千万别谈地狱的二元论。

sentences.english: Chapter III is an analyze of the theoretical structure in the monism of law and state of Kelsen.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，分析了凯尔森法与国家一元论的理论结构。

sentences.english: The paper point out finally that monism is the direction in which the human geography methodology works for.
sentences.chinese: 最后指出，一元论是人文地理学方法论革新的方向。

sentences.english: In Kelsen's theoretical structure, he approached the monism of law and state in two roads.
sentences.chinese: 凯尔森通过两个进路来建构其法与国家一元论的。

sentences.english: In the following discussion, only physicalistic monisms are considered. (See also: idealism.
sentences.chinese: 这样的唯心主义的一元论现在在西方不很常见。

sentences.english: Milton rather late in his life has become a monist.
sentences.chinese: 弥尔顿晚年成了个一元论者。

sentences.english: Qi-monism was created by Jixia school of daoist in the pre-qin periods.
sentences.chinese: “气一元论”为先秦道家稷下学派所创立。

sentences.english: Section IVis a description of the main features of the monism of law and state of Kelsen.
sentences.chinese: 第四节，描述了凯尔森法与国家一元论的主要特征。

definition: dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)
pluralism, philosophical doctrine that the universe consists of different substances
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
ontology
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
metaphysics
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
(philosophy) rationalism
theory/doctrine
atomic theory
pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
theory of reflection (in dialectic materialism), i.e. every perception reflects physical reality
materialistic
dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate
